functionDecorators.name: _deprecated_getStakerUnlockableTokensOnSmartContract
functionDecorators.description: to get tokens of staker that are unlockable.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: is the address of the staker.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakedContractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: is the address of staked contract in concern.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakedContractIndex
parameterDecorators.description: is the staked contract index in concern.

functionDecorators.name: _deprecated_unlockableBeforeBurningAndCanBurn
functionDecorators.description: to get tokens of staker locked before burning that are allowed to burn.

parameterDecorators.name: stakerAdd
parameterDecorators.description: is the address of the staker.

parameterDecorators.name: stakedAdd
parameterDecorators.description: is the address of staked contract in concern.

parameterDecorators.name: stakerIndex
parameterDecorators.description: is the staker index in concern.

functionDecorators.name: burnCAToken
functionDecorators.description: Burns tokens used for fraudulent voting against a claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: number of tokens to be burned.

functionDecorators.name: burnDepositCN
functionDecorators.description: to burn the deposited cover tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: coverId
parameterDecorators.description: is id of cover whose tokens have to be burned.

functionDecorators.name: burnStakedTokens
functionDecorators.description: Burns tokens staked on smart contract covered by coverId. Called when a payout is succesfully executed.

functionDecorators.name: burnStakerLockedToken
functionDecorators.description: Deprecated in favor of burnStakedTokens.

functionDecorators.name: changeDependentContractAddress
functionDecorators.description: Change Dependent Contract Address.

functionDecorators.name: changeMasterAddress
functionDecorators.description: change master address.

functionDecorators.name: depositCN
functionDecorators.description: Set the flag to check if cover note is deposited against the cover id.

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_getStakerAllLockedTokens
functionDecorators.description: Returns total amount of staked SOTE Tokens on all smart contracts.

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_getStakerAllUnlockableStakedTokens
functionDecorators.description: Returns total unlockable amount of staked SOTE Tokens on all smart contract .

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_getStakerLockedTokensOnSmartContract
functionDecorators.description: Internal function to gets amount of locked SOTE tokens, staked against smartcontract by index.

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_getStakerUnlockableTokensOnSmartContract
functionDecorators.description: Function to gets unlockable amount of locked SOTE tokens, staked against smartcontract by index.

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_getTotalStakedTokensOnSmartContract
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total staked SOTE tokens against Smart contract by all stakers.

functionDecorators.name: deprecated_unlockStakerUnlockableTokens
functionDecorators.description: releases unlockable staked tokens to staker.

functionDecorators.name: getLockedCNAgainstCover
functionDecorators.description: Returns amount of SOTE Tokens locked as Cover Note against given coverId.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Token price in a given currency.

parameterDecorators.description: is the user address in concern.

functionDecorators.name: getUserLockedCNTokens
functionDecorators.description: Returns amount of SOTE Tokens locked as Cover Note for given coverId.

functionDecorators.name: isLockedForMemberVote
functionDecorators.description: to check if a member is locked for member vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _of
parameterDecorators.description: is the member address in concern.

functionDecorators.name: lockCN
functionDecorators.description: to lock cover note tokens.

parameterDecorators.description: is number of tokens to be locked.

parameterDecorators.name: coverId
parameterDecorators.description: is the cover id of cover in concern.

parameterDecorators.name: _of
parameterDecorators.description: address whose tokens are to be locked.

functionDecorators.name: pushStakerRewards
functionDecorators.description: Rewards stakers on purchase of cover on smart contract.
